document.full_text: prime minister silvio berlusconi's center-right coalition risks losing its northern power base of milan to the left for the first time in nearly 20 years when voting in local elections ends on monday.
document.title: berlusconi faces high-stakes vote for milan mayor
lines_and_colors: prime minister silvio berlusconi's center-right coalition risks losing its northern power base of milan to the left for the first time in nearly 20 years when voting in local elections ends on monday.
